description: Dark-haired Blaze Austin decides to play a prank on his chiseled boyfriend, Justin Matthews. The tanned stud is on his way home from a work trip and buff babe Blaze sets up an elaborate scheme to make it seem as if he’s cheating. Justin comes home and finds blue-eyed Blaze in bed with none other than a dummy! He’s both shocked and happy at the same time, and what better way to get back at his boyfriend than by fucking his juicy bubble butt with his big dick.
title: When the Top's Away
